so_21130757: nc 192.168.1.186 9760 < commands.txt

nc 192.168.1.186 9760 <<END
command1
command2
END

echo command1^

command2 > commands.txt

nc 192.168.1.186 9760 < commands.txt

echo command1 & echo.command2 | nc 192.168.1.186 9760

so_18861961: #!/bin/bash

while read p; do
   echo "try $p"
   echo "\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x01\x5A\x30\x30\x02\x41\x41\x1B\x22\x61 Test message!\x04" | nc -v "$p" 3001 2>&1 | tee "$p.log" &
done < candidateIPs

wait

ul_104326: while read

while read -r value; do
    if [ "$value" = "1+1" ]; then 
        echo "2";
    else
        echo "0";
    fi
done
